About Us

Falcon Star, is an ultimate destination for comprehensive bag solutions in both business-to-business (B2B) and business-to-consumer (B2C) sectors. At Falcon Star, we specialize in catering to a diverse range of industries and institutions addressing their unique bag requirements from conceptualization to the delivery of the finished product. Our commitment extends to providing a seamless process, incorporating everything from designing to crafting functioning prototypes, ensuring that our clients receive tailor-made solutions that perfectly align with their needs.

With a broad clientele spanning various industries and institutions, Falcon Star has positioned itself as a trusted partner in the bag industry. Our expertise goes beyond mere transactions; we actively collaborate with our clients to understand their specific demands and deliver high-quality products that meet and exceed expectations. Not only do we serve as a reliable supplier to wholesalers, but we also market our products under the brand name "SKYFIT," a brand owned by Falcon Star. This underscores our dedication to delivering not just bags but a complete experience marked by innovation, reliability, and excellence.

Our Vision

To be the industrial leader in world class innovative designed product with Made in India tag to global supplies.

Our Strength

Creative Designs & Tailored Solutions
Experience innovation at its best with our unique designs and customized products, complete with a fully functional prototype that brings your ideas to life.

In-House Production
Our streamlined process ensures efficiency and quality control, as we handle every step of production in-house. From concept to creation, we've got it covered.

Sustainable Solutions within Your Budget
We believe in eco-friendly practices without compromising your budget. Explore our range of sustainable products tailored to fit your financial preferences.

Competitive Pricing, Reliable Quality
Expect the best of both worlds – competitive pricing without compromising on quality. We are committed to providing our customers with value for their investment.

On-Time Every Time
Our delivery motto is simple – "on time every time." Rest easy knowing that your orders will be delivered promptly, meeting your deadlines seamlessly.

OEM and ODM Orders with Warranty
Choose us for your OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) and ODM (Original Design Manufacturer) needs. Enjoy peace of mind with a one-year warranty on our products, ensuring your satisfaction.
